#OS Debug Standard.

= Introduction =

What is OS debug standard?
  * To display custom operating system debug information in peter-bochs. If you are developing your own operating system, you probably want to find a easy way to display the debug information out of the emulator. This document describe the data format of the OS debug information.


= Details =

  * The "OS debug information" is a continuous block of memory.
  * You can put this block of debug information anywhere in memory.
  * The block size is not fix. It depends on how much information you want to display in peter-bochs
  * peter-bochs debugger can display the os debug information.
